I am using Eclipse 1.0 with JUnit, but when I create my TestCase subclass,=
 I get an error on that line that states:

"The constructor junit.framework=
.TestCase() is not visible"

I am using JUnit 3.7.

Here is my code:


pack=
age junit.samples.money;

import junit.framework.TestCase;

public class My=
TestCase extends TestCase {

}
